text: my name is Jeff liner I'm vice president
of business development with softer AG
and we're an advanced technology partner
software EG helps organizations achieve
their business objectives faster our big
data integration and business process
technologies help customers to drive
operational efficiency modernize their
systems and optimize process for smarter
real-time decisions and better customer
service what makes software AG unique is
that we are the world's first digital
business platform delivering everything
companies need to compete in the digital
world we are helping companies to master
the analog to digital transformation we
chose to work with AWS because speaking
simply working with the AWS platform and
technology help software AG achieve more
efficient operations processes and
standards we provide a number of
solutions on AWS our cloud solutions
aris cloud alphabet cloud and webmethods
integration cloud are all available to
our customers on the AWS platform agile
apps cloud will follow in the near
future we are all in on AWS we decided
to go all-in on AWS because when we
started to talk about mastering the
digital transformation we quickly
realized that both software AG and AWS
each make an important contribution to
helping companies to adopt their cloud
strategies in working closely together
we have realized that we can help
companies increase the efficiency and
effectiveness of their cloud strategy we
feel that by going all-in on AWS we are
demonstrating to our customers that we
focus on working closely with best in
breed companies working closely with the
AWS partner network while building on
AWS has helped us increase our
operational efficiency and has also
provided us with a number of incremental
joint build and market opportunities as
we made the decision to go all-in we
have been able to grow our cloud

partner we expect additional growth

transformation to the cloud
our firm is participated in the isv

just now starting to work closely
together on joint opportunities and are

we are also pursuing some exciting

participate in the ISD acceleration
program we are looking forward to being
part of the SAS partner program as well
we feel that the SAS partner program
will benefit our firm by providing us

deliver cloud-based solutions with the
security reliability and scalability
that our global customers require and
expect we have experienced great support

defining our joint business plan and
leveraging technical and go-to-market
support our AWS partner manager
proactively supports us in all areas and
has provided valuable information and

and generate awareness within AWS on our
